text:
Wanted to share something cool <@U3T21PDBK> shared with me. John published a gist on GitHub - his own take on the HubSpot boilerplate's DND layout CSS. He's using a combo of CSS custom properties and HubL to simplify his CSS.
<https://gist.github.com/johnsfuller/967809f3304e0b83e6406e6c432814b2|https://gist.github.com/johnsfuller/967809f3304e0b83e6406e6c432814b2>
